title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Venezuela 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has rose over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is gradually increasing from 2014 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2018, slightly increasing from 2018 to 2019, and finally slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2021.
The line significantly increased by 10.82 from Year 2015 to 2016,increased by 17.0 from Year 2018 to 2019, and lastly, decreased by 25.0 from Year 2019 to 2020.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 35.0 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 3.89 was reported at Year 2014

The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2019 and 2020.

max_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is gradually increasing from 2014 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2018, slightly increasing from 2018 to 2019, and finally slightly decreasing from 2019 to 2021.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 35.0 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 3.89 was reported at Year 2014
The line rapidly increased by 173.95% from Year 2015 to 2016,increased by 94.44% from Year 2018 to 2019, and lastly, decreased by 71.43% from Year 2019 to 2020.
